languages.text: {n}Тишина. Веки сервитора чуть дрожат, взгляд устремлен в одну точку. В глубине единственного человеческого глаза, темного как омут, будто бы вспыхивает искра... или же это — игра воображения?{/n}
{n}Silence. The servitor's eyelids flutter slightly, its gaze staring off into space. Deep inside its single human eye, dark as a well, a spark seems to flicker... or is it just your imagination?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Тишина. Веки сервитора чуть дрожат, взгляд устремлен в одну точку. В глубине единственного человеческого глаза, темного как омут, будто бы вспыхивает искра... или же это — игра воображения?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Silence. The Servitor's eyelids are fluttering slightly, its gaze staring off into space. Deep inside its single human eye, dark as a well, a spark seems to flicker... or is it just your imagination?{/n}

{n}Silence. The servitor's eyelids flutter slightly, its gaze staring off into space. Deep inside its single human eye, dark as a well, a spark seems to flicker... or is it just your imagination?{/n}

languages.text: {n}一片沉默。这个机仆的眼皮微微颤动着，目光凝视着天空。在它一片漆黑的人眼深处，似乎跳跃着一丝火花……又或者说，这一切仅仅是你的幻觉？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Silence. The servitor's eyelids flutter slightly, its gaze staring off into space. Deep inside its single human eye, dark as a well, a spark seems to flicker... or is it just your imagination?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一片沉默。这个奴工的眼皮微微颤动着，目光凝视着天空。在它一片漆黑的人眼深处，似乎跳跃着一丝火花……又或者说，这一切仅仅是你的幻觉？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Silencio. El servidor parpadea rápidamente, con la mirada perdida en el vacío. En lo más profundo de su único ojo humano, negro como un pozo, parece titilar una llama... ¿o lo has imaginado?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Silence. The servitor's eyelids flutter slightly, its gaze staring off into space. Deep inside its single human eye, dark as a well, a spark seems to flicker... or is it just your imagination?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Silencio. El servidor parpadea rápidamente, con la mirada perdida en el vacío. En lo más profundo de su único ojo humano, negro como un pozo, parece titilar una llama... ¿o lo has imaginado?{/n}

languages.text: {n}返事はない。サーヴィターの目がわずかに瞬きし、遠くを見つめている。1つだけ残された井戸のように暗い人間の目の奥で、何かが一瞬きらめいたような気がするが…気のせいだろうか？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Silence. The servitor's eyelids flutter slightly, its gaze staring off into space. Deep inside its single human eye, dark as a well, a spark seems to flicker... or is it just your imagination?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}返事はない。サーヴィターの目がわずかに瞬きし、遠くを見つめている。1つだけ残された井戸のように暗い人間の目の奥で、何かが一瞬きらめいたような気がするが…気のせいだろうか？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Schweigen. Die Augenlider des Servitors flattern leicht, sein Blick geht in die Ferne. Tief in seinem einen menschlichen Auge, das dunkel ist wie ein Brunnenschacht, scheint ein Funke zu flackern ... oder ist das nur deine Einbildung?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Silence. The servitor's eyelids flutter slightly, its gaze staring off into space. Deep inside its single human eye, dark as a well, a spark seems to flicker... or is it just your imagination?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Schweigen. Die Augenlider des Servitors flattern leicht, sein Blick geht in die Ferne. Tief in seinem einen menschlichen Auge, das dunkel ist wie ein Brunnenschacht, scheint ein Funke zu flackern ... oder ist das nur deine Einbildung?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pas de réponse. Les paupières du servitor tressaillent légèrement, son regard toujours perdu dans le vague. Cependant, tout au fond de son unique œil humain, noir comme le fond d'un puits, il vous semble apercevoir comme une étincelle... ou serait-ce votre imagination ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Silence. The servitor's eyelids flutter slightly, its gaze staring off into space. Deep inside its single human eye, dark as a well, a spark seems to flicker... or is it just your imagination?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pas de réponse. Les paupières du servitor tressaillent légèrement, son regard toujours perdu dans le vague. Cependant, tout au fond de son unique œil humain, noir comme le fond d'un puits, il vous semble apercevoir comme une étincelle... ou serait-ce votre imagination ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sessizlik. Hizmetörün göz kapakları hafifçe titreşiyor, bakışları boşluğa kayıp gidiyor. Gece gibi karanlık tek insan gözünde bir parıltı çakıyor gibi. Yoksa hayal gücünün oyunu mu sadece?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Silence. The servitor's eyelids flutter slightly, its gaze staring off into space. Deep inside its single human eye, dark as a well, a spark seems to flicker... or is it just your imagination?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sessizlik. Servitörün göz kapakları hafifçe titriyor ve bakışları boşluğa doğru süzülüyor. Gece gibi karanlık tek insan gözünde bir parıltı görüyorsun. Yoksa gördüğünü mü sanıyorsun?{/n}
